claims.claim: Good credit scores are essential but insufficient without the financial capability to maintain mortgage payments.
claims.quote: I don't care how good my credit score is. If I can't pay the mortgage that you're gonna approve me for, then it means nothing. , if you don't have the finances to keep up with the mortgage and taxes and things like that, then it is useless

claims.claim: Credit building and home purchase assistance lose value without the financial stability to afford ongoing housing costs.
claims.quote: another thing, credit and things of that nature and, and trying to get your credit score to a point where you can qualify for, Purchasing a home and assistance with down payment.  And again, even at that, without the finances to do that, I don't care how good my credit score is. If I can't pay the mortgage that you're gonna approve me for, then it means nothing. , if you don't have the finances to keep up with the mortgage and taxes and things like that, then it is useless with it. All of these things are kind of intertwined.
